items.title: EEG Signal Sentiment Analysis (CNEL × Sony)
items.desc: HLDS-based latent-state tracking for EEG during media viewing, with metrics for prediction, separability, and affective labeling.

items.title: Neuromechanics Analysis – Zebrafish Voltage Imaging
items.imgAlt: Zebrafish voltage imaging project placeholder image
items.desc: Signal-processing and ML pipelines for 2D voltage imaging, with CFAR-style detectors (Gamma-CFAR) and QGD for event detection and interpretation.

items.title: Time-Series ML Library
items.desc: Automated architecture sweeps for time-series models and streamlined reporting; realized up to 16× efficiency via GPU acceleration.

items.title: Noise-Reduction Toolkit
items.desc: C-accelerated Python toolkit for evaluating real-time denoising and benchmarking across different noise and signal regimes.

items.title: EEG/EMG Helmet – Senior Design
items.imgAlt: EEG/EMG helmet senior design placeholder image
items.desc: Modular biosignal acquisition system with real-time ML constraints; emphasis on data path design and latency-aware pipelines.
